Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/daemons/cron

What you'll find here: runs programs periodically

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

anacron-2.0.1.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-03-21
Replacement for cron which does not require system to be up 24/7 (22991 bytes)
apmcd-1.15.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-11-30
cronlike APM daemon (based on batteries) (4558 bytes)
cron3.0pl1.tar.gz (LSM entry) (README) 1994-03-03
latest release of vixie cron (57926 bytes)
dcron-2.3.3.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-02-16
DCron - yet another cron (22962 bytes)
hc-cron-0.11.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-10-22
This program is a modified version of Paul Vixie's widely used cron daemon (66587 bytes)
ktab-0.4.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-01-23
A very simple and easy to use chrontab like program (15878 bytes)
ucrond-1.2.4.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-03-18
Cron daemon, mainly intended for systems that are frequently down (32770 bytes)
watchcrond-0.90.01-1.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-06-23
a daemon that periodically runs jobs at various intervals (15784 bytes)
